question: The Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI),has suspended Indian all-rounder Yusuf Pathan for how many months on doping violation_________________
explanation: All-rounder Yusuf Pathan has been suspended by the Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI) for a doping violation. The BCCI stated that a urine sample provided by Pathan on March 16, 2017 was tested and found to contain 'Terbutaline'. However, Yusuf's suspension has been backdated and he will be eligible to play from January 14 onwards.
